query.statement:
SELECT CHAR(HEX(CURRENT DATE)) BJD ,'' UPD ,'' SNM ,'' HDM ,POSID PJT ,right(posid_1, 3) HNO
,(SELECT zsite_nm FROM SAPHEE.zmaster01 WHERE posid=#PJT# AND MANDT=#G_MANDT#) zsite_nm ,(SELECT addr1||addr2||'('||zsite_tel||')' FROM SAPHEE.zmaster01 WHERE posid=#PJT# AND MANDT=#G_MANDT#) ADDR ,(SELECT namet FROM SAPHEE.zpst0011 WHERE MANDT=#G_MANDT# AND temno=R02.temno AND RETIF = '') NAMET ,(SELECT name1 FROM SAPHEE.zmmt012 WHERE MANDT=#G_MANDT# AND lifnr=R02.lifnr) NAME1 , (SELECT VALUE(X.VALUE, '') FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = R02.MANDT AND X.HOGI = R02.POSID_1 AND X.CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_EHM' ORDER BY X.SEQ DESC fetch first 1 rows only ) AS VALUE -- 재질 ,zspec1 , CAST(ZSPEC7 AS INTEGER) AS ZSPEC7 , CAST(ZSPEC11 AS INTEGER) AS ZSPEC11
,'' BSJ ,'' NAP ,'' REQ ,'' PDT ,'' RADIO_1 ,'' RADIO_2 ,'' FRAME_CK ,(CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SAPHEE.ZCMFL001 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = R02.MANDT AND X.GBN = 'E' AND X.PSPID = R02.POSID AND X.POSID = R02.POSID_1) > 0 THEN '파일첨부' ELSE '' END ) AS FILE FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 R02 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND right(posid_1, 3) = #HNO# AND POSID = #PJT#
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
